import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Block } from 'fannypack/Block/Block';

# Block

```js
import { Block } from 'fannypack';
```

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: block`.

```jsx-live
<Block>This is a block</Block>
```

# Theming

<Theme component={Block} overrides={['Block.base']}>This is a block</Theme>
